mapper.select: select restaurant_name as restaurantName ,restaurant_id as restaurantId, restaurant_description as restaurantDescription,restaurant_address as restaurantAddress,restaurant_regdate as restaurantRegdate,restaurant_main_photo as restaurantMainPhoto from restaurant order by restaurant_regdate desc limit 10

select restaurant_name as restaurantName,restaurant_id as restaurantId,restaurant_description as restaurantDescription,restaurant_address as restaurantAddress,restaurant_regdate as restaurantRegdate,restaurant_main_photo as restaurantMainPhoto from restaurant r inner join ( select restaurant_id as restaurantId, count(restaurant_id) as reservation_count from reservation group by restaurant_id order by reservation_count desc limit 10 ) res on r.restaurant_id = res.restaurantId;

select restaurant_name as restaurantName ,restaurant_id as restaurantId,restaurant_description as restaurantDescription,restaurant_address as restaurantAddress,restaurant_regdate as restaurantRegdate,restaurant_main_photo as restaurantMainPhoto from restaurant order by rand() limit 10;
